trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Like their human ancestors, Kalashtar vary widely in their natural talents. Two ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

trait.name: Dual Soul
trait.text: Kalashtar's twinned spirits make social manipulation come naturally. You gain proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, or Persuasion.

trait.name: Bastion of Mental Clarity
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against Enchantment spells and effects which would cause you to be charmed. You don't dream and are immune to the dream spell.

trait.name: Mindlink
trait.text: As an action, you can forge a telepathic bond with another willing creature within 30 feet, which must have an Intelligence of 3 or higher. Once formed, you can communicate with the bonded creature telepathically over any distance on the same plane. The bond lasts for 1 round per level. After using this ability, you cannot use it again until you complete a long rest. You may only have one bond active at a time.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You speak, read, and write Common and Quori.

trait.name: Naturally Psionic
trait.text: You gain 2 psi points. If you have psi points from another source, such as a class, add these points to your pool; otherwise, you can use these points to power your Mindlink ability.
You can also spend 1 psi point to reroll a Wisdom, Charisma, or Intelligence save you have just failed. You may not do so again until you complete a short or long rest.

If you added these points to an existing psi point pool, you regain them however you regain your other psi points (typically on a long rest). If these are your only psi points, you regain them on a long rest.
